zip.description: The postal or ZIP code of the location.

country.description: The full name of the country where the location is located.

legacy.description: Indicates if the location is a legacy location or not.

localized_country_name.description: The localized name of the country where the location is located.

city.description: The city where the location is based.

address2.description: The second line of the location's address.

address1.description: The first line of the location's address.

localized_province_name.description: The localized name of the province or state of the location.

active.description: Indicates if the location is currently active or not.

created_at.description: The date and time when the location was created.

province_code.description: The ISO code of the province or state where the location is located.

country_code.description: The ISO country code of the location.

province.description: The full name of the province or state where the location is located.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the location was last updated.

phone.description: The phone number associated with the location.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop associated with the location.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The Admin GraphQL API ID of the location.

country_name.description: The name of the country where the location is located.

id.description: The unique identifier of the location.
